survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of remote learning platforms used by educational institutions, focusing on user experience, feature satisfaction, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which remote learning platform do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture less common platforms. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly with dropdown or radio button options.
